# 关于许可的额外声明（在线版本参见 GitHub，以在线版本为准）
- 当许可证与本声明冲突时，以本声明为准；
- 对于本仓库中的任意代码片段：按照 `MPL 2.0` 中有关约定执行；
- 对于本仓库中的某一完整书源的转载或二次开发，需满足以下全部条件：
  - 在[本仓库](https://github.com/jiwangyihao/source-j-legado)的 `issue` 中提出请求并具体说明转载地址、二次开发后的书源开源地址以及其他必要信息；
  - 等待原作者（即本仓库的初始所有者和初始代码贡献者 [@jiwangyihao](https://github.com/jiwangyihao)）查看并通过 `issue` 或依据原作者要求更改转载方式或补充更详细的信息。
  - 考虑到本项目弃坑的可能，新 `issue` 开启后超过 20 个工作日原作者没有回复或者原作者回复要求更改的 `issue` 在更改后超过 20 个工作日原作者没有回复即视为原作者通过该 `issue`：
    - 此处的 `issue` 仅包括在[本仓库](https://github.com/jiwangyihao/source-j-legado)开启的，处于「开启状态」的 issue。（也就是说，请不要在已经关闭的 issue 中回复）。
    - 对于此种方式通过的 issue，转载/二次开发者仍应当遵守本声明中已经写明的相关约定。
  - 不得上传至源仓库或整理至`非轻小说专用`的书源合集中并应当避免其他人将转载/二次开发版本上传至源仓库或整理至`非轻小说专用`的书源合集中：
    - 关于轻小说的定义的额外说明：不包括国内的原创网络文学作品（如 `SF 轻小说` 中的原创轻小说以及`起点中文网`中标签包含轻小说的作品）。
    - 轻小说专用的定义：有且仅有想看轻小说的人可能会添加。
  - 必须在转载/二次开发地址的明显位置完整包含本声明的全部内容。
  - 必须保留源注释中原有的更改记录。

ruleContent.content:
<js>
z = source.getVariable().split(",");
if(!(parseInt(z[0])>0)){
  let regex = /var c="([^"]*)"/;
let dd = result.match(regex)[1]

let j = java.base64Decode(dd);
  //java.log(j)
  jja=String(j).replace(/^[^-]*-/,"-")
  if(/=/.test(jja)){jj=jja.replace(/=[^=]*$/,"");}else{jj=jja.replace(/_[^_]*$/,"");}
  
m=jj.replace(/-/g,"PHA+").replace(/_/g,"8L3A+");
n=java.getString("@@#chaptercontent@p@html");
n+	java.base64Decode(m)

  
}else if(parseInt(z[0])){
  src=eval(String(source.bookSourceComment))
result=java.getString("id.chaptercontent@html",src)
result
}

</js>

header: {"app-version":"4.1.1"}
loginUrl:
<js>
function getToken(){	return (source.getLoginHeaderMap()!=null && source.getLoginHeaderMap()!="")?source.getLoginHeaderMap().get("login_token"):"0f6bd1d063f202f71c3b84678027ce81"
	}
function getA(){
	return (source.getLoginHeaderMap()!=null && source.getLoginHeaderMap()!="")?source.getLoginHeaderMap().get("account"):"萌友521068519938";
	}
function encode(word){
  	return java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", java.base64DecodeToByteArray("L6alxSR4ttjXvcGpZozYtdcJtG4l0tSnQplRUONIRsw="), java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==")).encryptBase64(word);
	}
function decode(word){
    	return java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", java.base64DecodeToByteArray("L6alxSR4ttjXvcGpZozYtdcJtG4l0tSnQplRUONIRsw="), java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA==")).decryptStr(word);
}
    	
 function login(){
 	login_name=source.getLoginInfoMap().get("账号")
passwd=source.getLoginInfoMap().get("密码");
    let jsonStr = {
        "login_name": login_name,
        "passwd": passwd,
        "app_signature_md5": "f73576612783f8ed8b68cdf73a56be94",
        "app_version": "4.1.1",
        "channel": "default"
    }
    let body = "secret_content=" + encode(JSON.stringify(jsonStr));
    let option = {
        "method": "POST",
        "body": String(body)
    };
    
    url = "https://app.shubl.com/signup/login," + JSON.stringify(option)
    resp = JSON.parse(decode(java.ajax(url)))
    if (resp.code == "100000") {
     body = {
     	"login_token":resp.data.login_token,
     	"account":encodeURI(resp.data.reader_info.account)
     	}
     source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(body)) 
    } else {
        java.toast('❗️ ' + resp.tip + ' ❗️')
    }
}
</js>

<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;

var document = JsDom.parse(src);

function getText(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().text() : "";
}

function getHref(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().attr("href") : "";
}

function getSrc(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().attr("src") : "";
}

function generateJsonList() {
    var jsonList = [];
    var uls = document.select(".mySearch ul").not(".pagination"); 

    uls.forEach(function(ul) {
        var prevDiv = ul.previousElementSibling(); 
        var imgSrc = prevDiv ? getSrc("img", prevDiv) : ""; 

        var item = {
            "img": imgSrc,
            "name": getText("li:eq(0) a.b", ul),
            "author": getText("li:eq(2)", ul),
            "wordcount": getText("li:eq(3)", ul),
            "lastchaptr": getText("li:eq(1) a", ul),
            "kind": getText("li:eq(4)", ul)+","+getText("li:eq(5)", ul),
            "url": getHref("li:eq(0) a.b", ul)
        };
        jsonList.push(item);
    });

    return jsonList;
}

result = generateJsonList();
String(java.log(JSON.stringify(result)));


</js>
$[*]

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;


var document = JsDom.parse(src);

//获取列表
var links = document.select('.chap_tit > p > a');

var list = [];
for (var i = 0; i < links.size(); i++) {
    var link = links.get(i);
    list.push({
        text: link.text(),
        url: link.attr('href')
    });
}

//排序
list.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.text.match(/\d+/)[0], 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.text.match(/\d+/)[0], 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});


java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

ruleBookInfo.author: p:nth-child(2) > a@text
ruleBookInfo.name: h1@text

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;

var document = JsDom.parse(src);

// 获取列表 第一次需要修改的地方 修改正确的css 选择器
var links = document.select('#chapter-list > dd');

var list = [];
for (var i = 0; i < links.size(); i++) {
    var dd = links.get(i);
    var a = dd.select('a').first(); 
    if (a != null) { 
        list.push({
            text: a.text(),
            id: dd.attr('id').replace('c', ''), //获取ID属性 需要自己手动改 第二处需要修改的地
            url: a.attr('href')
        });
    } 
}

// 排序
list.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.id, 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.id, 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});

java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;

var document = JsDom.parse(src);

// 获取列表 第一次需要修改的地方 修改正确的css 选择器
var links = document.select('ul> li');

var list = [];
for (var i =0; i < links.size(); i++) {
    var dd = links.get(i);
    var a = dd.select('a').first(); 
    if (a != null) { 
        list.push({
            text: a.text(),
            id: dd.attr('id').replace('ch', ''), //获取ID属性 需要自己手动改 第二处需要修改的地
            url: a.attr('href')
        });
    } 
}

// 排序
list.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.id, 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.id, 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});

java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

<js>
match=result.match(/d\(".+"[^"]+".+"\)/)
function d(a, b){
	b = java.md5Encode(b)
	iv = b.substring(0, 16)
	key = b.substring(16)
	Cipher=java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS7Padding" ,key,iv)
	return Cipher.decryptStr(a)}
eval(match[0])
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
temp=result
R=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(temp).select(".BCsectionTwo-top-chapter a")
c=[]
R.forEach(r=>{
	i=String(r.attr('href')).replace(/.+\/\d+\/(\d+)\.html/,`$1`)
	//java.log(i)
	c.push({
		name:r.text(),
		url:r.attr('href'),
		index:i
		})
	})
try{
	o=temp.match(/originalOrder[^=]*=[^\[]*\[([^\]]+)\]/)[1]
	o=o.split(",")
	c.sort((a,b)=>o[c.indexOf(a)]-o[c.indexOf(b)])
	}catch (err){
		java.log(err)
		c.sort((a,b)=>a.index-b.index)
		}
	result=c
</js>

.replace(/\[|。/,'')

ruleSearch.author: .author@text##\/.*
ruleSearch.lastChapter: .new@text##正文卷.|正文.|VIP卷.|默认卷.|卷_|VIP章节.|免费章节.|章节目录.|最新章节.|[\(（【].*?[求更票谢乐发订合补加架字修Kk].*?[】）\)]
ruleSearch.name: h3@text

ruleToc.chapterName:
text##^\d+\.|（.*合.*|（含.*|\(.*合.*|\(含.*
@js:result
.replace("••","")
.replace(/^(\d+).第/,'第')
.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节|免费章节.|章节目录)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求含理更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*/g,'')
.replace(/^(\d+)[、．]第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+/,'$1')
.replace(/^(\d+)、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/\(.+\)/,'')
.replace(/\[|。/,'')
.replace(/第([零一二两三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
##(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)##$1 $2$3

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

account：填写账号密码调试后获取

    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
  function decode(word){
      let key=SecretKeySpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("nvlrM3RT6n0iYj4I/zbGqisUGGMpy3UT84cNphYONC8="),"AES");
      let iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="));
      let chipher=Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
      let bytes=Base64.decode(String(word).getBytes(),2);
      chipher.init(2,key,iv);
      return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}

<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
  function encode(word){
      let key=SecretKeySpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("nvlrM3RT6n0iYj4I/zbGqisUGGMpy3UT84cNphYONC8="),"AES");
      let iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="));
      let chipher=Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
      chipher.init(1,key,iv);
      return java.encodeURI(Base64.encodeToString(chipher.doFinal(String(word).getBytes()),Base64.NO_WRAP));
    }
  function decode(word){
      let key=SecretKeySpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("nvlrM3RT6n0iYj4I/zbGqisUGGMpy3UT84cNphYONC8="),"AES");
      let iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="));
      let chipher=Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
      let bytes=Base64.decode(String(word).getBytes(),2);
      chipher.init(2,key,iv);
      return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

<js>
//一行个数
var nums = 4 ;
//分隔符
var separator = '::'

//标题::链接::一行个数::分类

all=[
"----------     🏷标签     ----------::::1",
"进击的巨人::进击的巨人::::a"
];

//@天天gg@酷安 下面不要动
function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	
	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"https://zhidao.baidu.com/msearch/ajax/getsearchlist?word="+url+"&pn=10":url;
 try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];
 u=tag=="a"?'https://zhidao.baidu.com/msearch/ajax/getsearchlist?word='+url+'&pn=10':u;

 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))
</js>

let res = JSON.parse(result).data.content function getComic(result) { let mat = result.match(/
([\s\S]*?)<\/article>/); try { let cnt = JSON.parse( mat ? mat[1].replace(/\&/g, '"').replace(/\;/g, "").replace(/\#34/g, "") : result ); return (mat ? cnt.skeleton.data : cnt.picInfos) .map((i) => { let path = mat ? cnt.materials[i.element_name].data.web_uri : "novel-pic/" + i.md5; return ``; }) .join("
"); } catch (e) { // not comic content mat = result.match(/([\s\S]*?)<\/body>/) // java.log(result) return (mat ? mat[1] : result).toString().replace(/\<\!DOCTYPE html.*/g, "").replace(/\/, "").replace(/\\<\/a\>/g, "") } } result = getComic(String(res)); result.replace(/\{\!\-\- PGC_VOICE\:.*\-\-\}/g, "")

ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
function getBookIdFull(url) {
	const {java} = this
	$ = JSON.parse(url).data
	if ($.book_shelf_info != 0 && $.book_shelf_info != undefined) {
		arr = $.book_shelf_info.map($ => $.book_id)
	} else if (list = $.data_list != 0 && $.data_list != undefined)  {
		arr = $.data_list.map($ => $.book_id_str)
	} else {
		java.toast("获取 book_id 失败，你可能需要登录！")
	}
	return arr
}
let ck = "sessionid=" + (String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) ? String(cookie.getKey("fanqienovel.com", "sessionid")) : (source.getLoginInfoMap() ? source.getLoginInfoMap() : {})['手动登录Token'])

getShelf = () => {
let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'
let book_shelf_info = java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
  headers: {
    'Cookie': ck
  }
}))

bid = getBookIdFull(book_shelf_info)
let id_list = splitArray(bid, 100)
let urls = []
id_list.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(source.bookSourceUrl.split("#")[0] + "/multi-detail?book_id=" + i.join(","))
})

res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

let resp = {book_info: []}
res.forEach(r => {
  resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
})

return resp
}

function getByGroupName(name) {
  let book_shelf_url = 'https://fanqienovel.com/reading/bookapi/bookshelf/info/v:version/?aid=1967&iid=0&version_code=57700&update_version_code=57700'

  let book_shelf_info = JSON.parse(java.ajax(book_shelf_url + ', ' + JSON.stringify({
    headers: {
      'Cookie': ck,
    }
  })))
  let group_bookids = {
    "未分组": []
  }
  // java.log(
  book_shelf_info.data.book_shelf_info.forEach(i => {
    if (!group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "未分组"]) group_bookids[i.group_name] = []
    group_bookids[i.group_name ? i.group_name : "未分组"].push(i.book_id)
  })
  // java.log(JSON.stringify(group_bookids["未分组"]))
  // java.log(decodeURIComponent(name))
  if (!group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)]) return {data: []}
  //java.log("awa")
  let book_ids = splitArray(group_bookids[decodeURIComponent(name)], 100)
  let urls = []

  book_ids.forEach(i => {
    urls.push(source.bookSourceUrl.split("#")[0] + "/multi-detail?book_id=" + i.join(","))
  })
  
  res = java.ajaxAll(urls)

  let resp = {book_info: []}
  res.forEach(r => {
    resp.book_info = resp.book_info.concat(JSON.parse(r.body()).data)
  })

  return resp
}

function getByTabIndex(index) {
  let url = _mlsec.requestHeader(
	  "bookmall/tab",
    "version_name=5.8.9.32",
	  null,
	  ck
  )
  let all = JSON.parse(java.ajax(url))
  let tab = all.data.tab_item[0].cell_data[index].cell_data
  if (!tab) tab = []
  let bookList = []
  for (let i of tab) {
    bookList = bookList.concat(i.book_data)
    // java.log(JSON.stringify(i.book_data))
  }
  return { book_info: bookList }
}

if (baseUrl.endsWith("bookshelf")) result = getShelf("bookshelf/info")
else {
  let w = baseUrl.split("/")
  if (baseUrl.includes("groupName")) {
    result = getByGroupName(w[w.length - 1])
  } else if (baseUrl.includes("tab")) {
    result = getByTabIndex(parseInt(w[w.length - 1]))
  } else result = JSON.parse(result)
}
JSON.stringify({data: result.book_info || result.data.book_info || result.detail_list || result.data})
</js>
$.data[*]
ruleExplore.name: $.book_name

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
let res = JSON.parse(result)
let books

if (res.search_tabs) {
  res.search_tabs.forEach((i) => {
    if (i.tab_type == 3) books = i.data
  })
} else books = res.data

let results = []

books.forEach(w => {
  results.push(w.book_data[0])
})

JSON.stringify(results)
</js>$[*]

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;

var document = JsDom.parse(src);

function getText(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().text() : "";
}

function getHref(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().attr("href") : "";
}

function getSrc(selector, context) {
    var elements = context ? context.select(selector) : document.select(selector);
    return elements.size() > 0 ? elements.first().attr("src") : "";
}

function generateJsonList() {
    var jsonList = [];
    var uls = document.select(".mySearch ul").not(".pagination"); 

    uls.forEach(function(ul) {
        var prevDiv = ul.previousElementSibling(); 
        var imgSrc = prevDiv ? getSrc("img", prevDiv) : ""; 

        var item = {
            "img": imgSrc,
            "name": getText("li:eq(0) a.b", ul),
            "author": getText("li:eq(2)", ul),
            "wordcount": getText("li:eq(3)", ul),
            "lastchaptr": getText("li:eq(1) a", ul),
            "kind": getText("li:eq(4)", ul)+","+getText("li:eq(5)", ul),
            "url": getHref("li:eq(0) a.b", ul)
        };
        jsonList.push(item);
    });

    return jsonList;
}

result = generateJsonList();
String(java.log(JSON.stringify(result)));


</js>

建议登录
酷安 @吉王义昊
GitHub：https://github.com/jiwangyihao/source-j-legado
# 关于许可的额外声明（在线版本参见 GitHub，以在线版本为准）
- 当许可证与本声明冲突时，以本声明为准；
- 对于本仓库中的任意代码片段：按照 `MPL 2.0` 中有关约定执行；
- 对于本仓库中的某一完整书源的转载或二次开发，需满足以下全部条件：
  - 在[本仓库](https://github.com/jiwangyihao/source-j-legado)的 `issue` 中提出请求并具体说明转载地址、二次开发后的书源开源地址以及其他必要信息；
  - 等待原作者（即本仓库的初始所有者和初始代码贡献者 [@jiwangyihao](https://github.com/jiwangyihao)）查看并通过 `issue` 或依据原作者要求更改转载方式或补充更详细的信息。
  - 考虑到本项目弃坑的可能，新 `issue` 开启后超过 20 个工作日原作者没有回复或者原作者回复要求更改的 `issue` 在更改后超过 20 个工作日原作者没有回复即视为原作者通过该 `issue`：
    - 此处的 `issue` 仅包括在[本仓库](https://github.com/jiwangyihao/source-j-legado)开启的，处于「开启状态」的 issue。（也就是说，请不要在已经关闭的 issue 中回复）。
    - 对于此种方式通过的 issue，转载/二次开发者仍应当遵守本声明中已经写明的相关约定。
  - 不得上传至源仓库或整理至`非轻小说专用`的书源合集中并应当避免其他人将转载/二次开发版本上传至源仓库或整理至`非轻小说专用`的书源合集中：
    - 关于轻小说的定义的额外说明：不包括国内的原创网络文学作品（如 `SF 轻小说` 中的原创轻小说以及`起点中文网`中标签包含轻小说的作品）。
    - 轻小说专用的定义：有且仅有想看轻小说的人可能会添加。
  - 必须在转载/二次开发地址的明显位置完整包含本声明的全部内容。
  - 必须保留源注释中原有的更改记录。
整理修改缝合：酷安 Wolken

with(javaImport){
    function encrypt(str){
        var bArr = String(str).getBytes("UTF-8");
        var mac = Mac.getInstance("HmacSHA256");
        mac .init(SecretKeySpec(String("wj3imab73kwceuf51lf01ORHe2cmo8X0YrZwF4p2uv3WEfmqxrT2oIBwRFRNErXW20UKal15ZTDdxPKU43puZFqcuXkvrQmadhp1wn6YPEDO4WRgInp8NNNQo4uNsWF1CELOzx7yPOS4pQbhTRWB4qRm0a4ENIegN0SH7K2STbsyaCuWh7m7s3rTpb5dK3CcDdsT35vo0xNbPZI2dJmKoIeKk9p3YhBLNWp9WoZqn9Qihpvn4nvgJzVSacgy2MTo").getBytes("UTF-8"),"HmacSHA256"));
        return mac.doFinal(bArr)
    }
  function encode(bArr) {
        if (bArr === null) {
            return null;
        }
        var length = bArr.length * 8;
        if (length === 0) {
            return "";

);

      let iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="));
      let chipher=Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
      chipher.init(1,key,iv);
      return java.encodeURI(Base64.encodeToString(chipher.doFinal(String(word).getBytes()),Base64.NO_WRAP));
    }
  function decode(word){
      let key=SecretKeySpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("nvlrM3RT6n0iYj4I/zbGqisUGGMpy3UT84cNphYONC8="),"AES");
      let iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="));
      let chipher=Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
      let bytes=Base64.decode(String(word).getBytes(),2);
      chipher.init(2,key,iv);
      return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}

var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
  function decode(word){
      let key=SecretKeySpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("nvlrM3RT6n0iYj4I/zbGqisUGGMpy3UT84cNphYONC8="),"AES");
      let iv=IvParameterSpec(java.base64DecodeToByteArray("AAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAA=="));
      let chipher=Cipher.getInstance("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
      let bytes=Base64.decode(String(word).getBytes(),2);
      chipher.init(2,key,iv);
      return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}

response=decode(result)
// 打印解密结果
java.log(JSON.stringify(JSON.parse(response)))
response
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))

var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
    Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util
);

with(javaImport){
    function decrypt(str){
        var key=SecretKeySpec(String("ZKYm5vSUhvcG9IbXNZTG1pb2").getBytes(),"DESede");
        var iv=IvParameterSpec(String("01234567").getBytes());
        var bytes=Base64.decode(String(str).getBytes(),2);
        var chipher=Cipher.getInstance("DESede/CBC/PKCS5Padding");
        chipher.init(2,key,iv);
        return String(chipher.doFinal(bytes));
    }
}
decrypt(JSON.parse(result).data.replace(/(\r\n)|(\n)|(\r)/g,''))

<js>
//DES加密开始
var javaImport = new JavaImporter();
javaImport.importPackage(
     Packages.java.lang,
    Packages.javax.crypto.spec,
    Packages.javax.crypto,
    Packages.android.util  
);
with(javaImport){
function encryptByDES(massage, keydata) {
        let cipher = Cipher.getInstance("DES");
        let keySpec = new DESKeySpec(String(keydata).getBytes());
         let keyFactory = SecretKeyFactory.getInstance("DES");
         let key = keyFactory.generateSecret(keySpec);      
        cipher.init(Cipher.ENCRYPT_MODE, key);
        return Base64.encodeToString(cipher.doFinal(String(massage).getBytes()),Base64.NO_WRAP)
}
}
//DES加密结束

var deskey = 'web@hzlq';
var userId='0';
function getPostUrl(data,type) {
var url = 'http://m.ndlib.cn/nlc_read_home/service.do,';
var md5Key = 'library_2016@hzlq';
value = {
    siteId: 1,
    data:String(encryptByDES(JSON.stringify(data), deskey)),
    userId: userId,
    fromSource: 3,
    osType: 5,
    version: "1.0.1",
    versionCode: 10001,
    timeStamp: data.timeStamp,
    hashCode: String(java.md5Encode(data.timeStamp + md5Key))
}
var option={
"method":"POST",
"body":'cmd='+type+'&value=' + encodeURIComponent(JSON.stringify(value))
}
return url + JSON.stringify(option);
}
var data ={
    timeStamp:Date.now(),
    bigType:"0",
    pageSize:100,
    pageNum:parseInt(java.get('page'))
};

if(baseUrl.match(/categoryId/)){
data.categoryId=baseUrl.match(/categoryId=(\d+)/)[1];
url=getPostUrl(data,'qryCategoryResList')
}else{
data.content=String(java.get('key'));
url=getPostUrl(data,'qrySearchList')
}

java.ajax(url)
</js>

exploreUrl:
<js>
const res = java.connect(`${baseUrl}/sort/`);
var regex = /<li><a href="(\/sort\/\d+_\d+\/)">([^<]+)<\/a><span>共 (\d+) 本<\/span><\/li>/g;
const html = res.body();

const categories = [];
let match;
while ((match = regex.exec(html)) != null) {
  java.log(match[2])
  categories.push({
    url: match[1],
    title: match[2],
    count: parseInt(match[3], 10)
  });
}

JSON.stringify(categories);
</js>

jsLib:
function method(result){
const {java,source,cookie}=this;
result=result
.replace(/sao/gi,'骚')
.replace(/diao/gi,'屌')
.replace(/zhong/gi,'种')
.replace(/nai/gi,'奶')
.replace(/ai/gi,'爱')
.replace(/se/gi,'色')
.replace(/cha/gi,'插')
.replace(/shen/gi,'呻')
.replace(/she(头)/gi,'舌$1')
.replace(/kua/gi,'胯')
.replace(/she/gi,'射')
.replace(/(呻)yin/gi,'$1吟')
.replace(/yin(道|户|蒂)/gi,'阴$1')
.replace(/yin/gi,'淫')
.replace(/xing/gi,'性')
.replace(/bi/gi,'逼')
.replace(/cao/gi,'操')
.replace(/chun/gi,'春')
.replace(/lun/gi,'伦')
.replace(/giang/gi,'肛')
.replace(/gan/gi,'干')
.replace(/luan/gi,'乱')
.replace(/jian/gi,'奸')
.replace(/ju/gi,'菊')
.replace(/chao/gi,'潮')
.replace(/dong/gi,'洞')
.replace(/rou/gi,'肉')
.replace(/ru/gi,'乳')
.replace(/xue/gi,'穴')
.replace(/nu/gi,'奴')
.replace(/bang/gi,'棒')
.replace(/jing/gi,'精')
.replace(/pi/gi,'屁')
.replace(/tun/gi,'臀');
return java.t2s(result)
}

list=java.getElements("@@li.site").toArray(); intro=java.getElements('#intro').html(); href=''; text=''; for (i in list){ href=href+list[i].select('a:eq(1)').attr('href')+'\n'; text=text+'◖'+i+'◗'+list[i].html()+'\n'; } java.put('list',href); xu=(book.getVariable("custom")==null||book.getVariable("custom")=="")?"0":book.getVariable("custom"); laiyuan='当前来源◖'+xu+'◗'; result='
来源列表(右上角书籍变量输入下方的序号刷新即可切换至对应的来源，默认为0)\n'+text+'\n'+laiyuan+'\n------------\n'+intro ##更新 .*

ruleContent.content:
<js>
try{
	//Aes解密
	matchResult=src.match(/html\(d\(['"](.+)['"],\s+['"](.+)['"]\)\);/);
	string=matchResult[1];
	code=java.md5Encode(matchResult[2]);
	iv=code.substring(0,16);
	key=code.substring(16);
	result=java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS7Padding",key,iv).decryptStr(string)
}catch(err){
	//解密失败使用webView加载重新获取内容
	src=java.ajax(baseUrl+',{"webView":true}');
	result=java.getString('#C0NTENT@html',src)
}
result
</js>
<js>method(result)</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
m=java.getElements('#searchmain@class.searchTopic');
n=java.getElements('#searchmain@class.searchInfo');
list = [];
for(i in m){
	con = {};
	con.n= String(m[i].select('.searchtitle').text())
	.replace(/《|》|txt.*/g,'')
	con.k = n[i].select('a').get(0).text();
	con.l = n[i].select('.oldDate').text();
	con.w = String(n[i].ownText()).replace(/.*大小：|日期.*/g,'');
	con.b = n[i].select('a').get(1).attr('href');
	list.push(con);
	}
list
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
n=result.match(/第1页 \/ 共(\d+) 页/)[1];
var list=[];
var n = parseInt(n);
ul=java.getString('ul a.0@href');
ui=baseUrl.match(/(.*\/\/[^\/]+)\//)[1];

for(var i=1;i<=n;i++)
{
	url=ui+String(ul).replace(/page=1/,"page="+i);
	me='第'+i+'页';
	list.push({"text":me,"href":url});
}
list
</js>

<js>
b=baseUrl.match(/gid=(\d+)&nid=(\d+)&sort=(\d+)&chapter_name=(.*$)/);
t = String(Math.round(new Date()));
gid=b[1];
nid=b[2];
s = b[3];
c = b[4];
snk=java.md5Encode("a=1&ac=999&appType=0&appid=10001&appverion=508500&autoBuy=0&bidType=0&birt=1706674841000&ch=blf1298_10928_001&chType=6&chapter_name="+c+"&cid=eef_easou_book&dzh=1&gender=1&gid="+gid+"&gsort=0&instId="+t+"&instime="+t+"&nid="+nid+"&os=android&pr=-1.0&ptype=5&pushid=7b4aaf1210a5bdbac3cea26d5030a419&recSw=1&rtype=2&scp=0&sequence=1&session_id=153F4EEE16F56A43FD63ZD21B866413ED9BE044EFB876A115C62DBED82EE4C824D&sgsort=0&sort="+s+"&tm=0&udid=3d3ec742930b635fc4c61f0575dbc4d2939edbe2&userInitPay=3&utype=0&vm=5.8.5&key=EaSoU0517+PuBlIsHkEy-JRKKOWTUNZCNTWY-");
snk = snk.toUpperCase();

url=`https://api.ieasou.com/api/bookapp/chargeChapter.m?a=1&autoBuy=0&cid=eef_easou_book&vm=5.8.5&os=android&udid=3d3ec742930b635fc4c61f0575dbc4d2939edbe2&appverion=508500&ch=blf1298_10928_001&session_id=153F4EEE16F56A43FD63ZD21B866413ED9BE044EFB876A115C62DBED82EE4C824D&dzh=1&scp=0&appid=10001&utype=0&rtype=2&pushid=7b4aaf1210a5bdbac3cea26d5030a419&ptype=5&gender=1&userInitPay=3&birt=1706674841000&instime=${t}&instId=${t}&chType=6&bidType=0&recSw=1&appType=0&pr=-1.0&tm=0&ac=999&gid=${gid}&nid=${nid}&sort=${s}&gsort=0&sgsort=0&sequence=1&chapter_name=${c}&snk=${snk}`;
java.ajax(url)
</js>$.content<js>
function a(str) {
	str = String(str);
	length = str.length / 2;
	bArr = [];
	for (i = 0; i < length; i++) {
		i2 = i * 2;
		bArr[i] =  intToByte(parseInt(str.substring(i2, i2 + 2), 16));
  }
  return bArr;
}
function intToByte(i) {
	var b = i & 0xFF;var c = 0;
	if (b >= 128) {c = b % 128;c = -1 * (128 - c);}
	else {c = b;}
	return c;
}

 function byteToHexString(arr) {
    return arr.reduce((accu, item) => {
        let a =(item&0xff).toString(16)
        if (a.length ==1) a = "0" + a
        return accu += a
    }, "")
  }
  function hextoBase64(t) {
	function parse(t) {
		t = String(t)
		for (var e = t.length, r = [], i = 0; i < e; i += 2){
		r[i >>> 3] |= parseInt(t.substr(i, 2), 16) << 24 - i % 8 * 4;
		}
		return r;
	}
	function stringify(t) {
		var e = t
		, r = 4 * t.length
		, i = "ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZabcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789+/=";
		for (var n = [], o = 0; o < r; o += 3){
		    for (var s = (e[o >>> 2] >>> 24 - o % 4 * 8 & 255) << 16 | (e[o + 1 >>> 2] >>> 24 - (o + 1) % 4 * 8 & 255) << 8 | e[o + 2 >>> 2] >>> 24 - (o + 2) % 4 * 8 & 255, a = 0; a < 4 && o + .75 * a < r; a++){
			n.push(i.charAt(s >>> 6 * (3 - a) & 63));}
		}
		var c = i.charAt(64);
		if (c){
		   for (; n.length % 4; ){
			      n.push(c);}
		}
		return n.join("")
	}
	return stringify(parse(t));
}

sf = "DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding";
d=hextoBase64(byteToHexString(a(result)));
key = iv = "EaSoUcNt";
result=java.aesBase64DecodeToString(d,key,sf,iv);
